participant_1.background:
I'm small, but I stand out in a crowd because I love wearing leather.
I've had to raise my kids as a single parent.
I like to eat healthy foods so that I have energy to teach my students.
I'm always looking for ways to make my home cooking more exciting, and I love trying new recipes.
i sing many songs.

participant_2.background:
I am a swimmer who is proud of my family but sometimes feel disconnected from them.
I make sure my beta fish travels with me when I move.
I bought a set of dice for my favorite tabletop game.
I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow.
I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing.

content.text: Hi there, how are you today?
Doing well, thanks. What about you?
I'm doing well too, thanks for asking. What are your interests?
I'm interested in swimming, tabletop gaming, and my family.
That's great! I love to swim too. What's your favorite thing about swimming?
I love the feeling of being in the water and the challenge of getting better at it.
I agree, it's really relaxing. What's your favorite tabletop game?
I love Dungeons and Dragons. I've been playing it for years and I love the creativity and teamwork involved.
That's a great game! I've never played it, but I've heard good things about it.
You should try it! It's a lot of fun.
I will, thanks for the recommendation.
No problem. What else do you like to do?
I love to cook. I'm always looking for new recipes to try and I love experimenting with different flavors.
That's great! I love to cook too. I'm not the best at it, but I enjoy it.
We should cook together sometime! I'm sure we'd have a lot of fun.
That would be great! I'd love to learn some new recipes.
Great! We can exchange recipes and cook together.
